name: PET HOSPITAL
description:
The best veterinary clinic game on the Nintendo 3DSâ„¢! Hamsters, birds, cats, dogs, horses... become a real veterinarian and take care of your favourite animals!

Dr Robert's clinic is going through difficult times and needs your skills to develop and expand. Examinations, diagnostics and treatments: heal your patients and unlock new veterinary health centres so you can receive all patients furred and feathered.

Features: Impressive vet simulation in 3D Fur shaded animals 23 treatments and operations
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
